resources.string: Wannan zaɓin zai aika hanyar haɗi zuwa wannan kayan aikin ga aboki. Lokacin da aka buɗe hanyar haɗin yanar gizon zai fara zaman raba allo.
Yayin da kake gungurawa kayan aiki akan wayarka, allon abokinka zai amsa ta hanya guda. Wannan yana ba ku damar tafiya ta kayan aiki tare akan na\'urori 2 a lokaci guda.
Aika hanyar haɗi zuwa mutum ɗaya ko fiye don fara zaman raba allo yanzu.
